itemInfo.itemDesc:
This Cooking ingredient can be obtained by a variety of methods.
- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Northern Wheat Plantation. It can also be obtained by Farming Barley Seeds using a Garden.

- Usage: Beer, Grain Soup, Vinegar, etc.

item.name: Barley Crate
item.desc: A crop that was Processed to increase its marketability. It can be sold to Traders.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Crafted using a Workbench.

item.name: Barley Flour
item.desc:
A fine flour made by Grinding.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Barley.

- Usage: Essence of Liquor, Meat Stew, Oatmeal, etc.

item.name: Concentrated Grain Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals HP by+125.\n- Cooldown : 5 sec.\n- Weighs lighter than normal potion.

item.name: Grain Juice
item.desc: Immediately heals HP by+75.\n- Cooldown : 5 sec.\n- Weighs lighter than normal potion.

item.name: Inorganic Fertilizer
item.desc: Boosts growth rate of crops. Using fertilizer reduces the growth time for crops in the garden.\nâ€» There's a cool-down time of 5 seconds.
